data.name: Tiffin Service Backend API
content: Developed a {{Spring Web}} backend providing {{RESTful APIs}} for a Tiffin Service platform, supporting both mobile and web clients via {{Flutter}}.
{{Automated}} data entry for new customers and implemented fee reminder notifications for subscription cycles.
{{Built}} {{endpoints}} to fetch daily dish menus and manage customer cycles, {{eliminating}} reliance on {{manual Excel sheets}}.
Created an admin dashboard for managing duties, monitoring customer details, and overseeing subscription cycles.
Planning integration with {{AWS Cloud Storage}} and setting up {{CI/CD}} pipelines using {{GitHub Actions}} for automated deployment.

data.name: ACME Medical REST API
content: Developed a secure {{RESTful API}} for ACME Medical Corp enabling {{CRUD operations}} with {{Jakarta EE role-based security}} (ADMIN_ROLE/USER_ROLE).
Designed {{JPA entities}} (Patient, SecurityUser) mapped to a relational schema, implementing {{JWT authentication}} and automated {{JUnit tests}}.
Applied {{design patterns}} (Singleton, Factory) and documented endpoints via {{Postman}}.
Collaborated in an {{Agile}} team using {{Git/GitHub}} for version control.

data.name: MongoDB Python Web Catalog
content: Built a dynamic movie review platform using {{Python}} and {{Flask}} with a flexible {{MongoDB}} schema-less database.
Integrated {{PyMongo}} for seamless CRUD operations and real-time data manipulation.
Designed RESTful APIs supporting user authentication, review management, and data retrieval.
Deployed database on {{MongoDB Atlas}} and tested APIs with {{Postman}}.
Collaborated using {{Git/GitHub}} in an {{Agile}} development environment.

data.name: Integrated Data Analysis for Transportation Safety Enhancement
content: The project {{analyzes}} Ottawaâ€™s 2020 transportation collision dataset (10,047 records, 28 features) to enhance road safety via {{data-driven}} insights. Key tasks include {{classification}}, {{outlier detection}} , and {{clustering}} .

{{Data preprocessing}} involved missing value imputation, {{normalization}}, and feature engineering (date/time parsing, nominal-to-numeric encoding). Core attributes selected for modeling include spatiotemporal factors, collision classification, environmental conditions, traffic control, and injury severity.

{{Normalized data supports clustering}} and {{outlier detection}}, while categorical transformations enable {{classification via decision trees}}. The goal is to identify critical factors contributing to collision severity for targeted interventions.

data.name: Food Waste Reduction Platform
content: The platform {{connects}} food businesses, consumers, and charitable organizations to reduce global food waste through {{custom}} and {{subscription-based}} web services.

It employs an MVC architecture with {{React}} or {{Angular}} for the front end, business logic using {{Singleton}} and {{Observer}} design patterns, and a {{MySQL}} database managed via the {{DAO}} pattern.

Security features include {{user authentication}} (multi-factor and OAuth), {{data encryption}} (AES for data at rest, SSL/TLS for data in transit), and compliance with {{GDPR}} and {{HIPAA}} standards.
Deployment leverages {{cloud infrastructure}} (AWS/Azure), {{Docker}} containerization, and orchestration with {{Kubernetes}} or {{Docker Swarm}} for scalable and fault-tolerant operations.
Testing involves {{JUnit}} for unit tests, automated {{API testing}}, and {{User Acceptance Testing}} to validate platform functionality.

data.name: Java Android Application
content: Developed a {{Java-based Android}} app integrating Song Search, Live Weather updates, and a Dictionary for a unified user experience.
Implemented local {{SQLite}} database storage for saving and managing search terms, song names, and locations with options to view and delete.
Integrated {{multiple external APIs}} using {{Volley}} for real-time data retrieval and display.
Enabled multi-language support and included an in-app help menu for user assistance.
Utilized {{RecyclerView}} to efficiently display lists such as favorite locations, saved words, and search results.
Conducted {{UI testing}} using {{Espresso}} and unit testing with {{JUnit}} to ensure app quality.

data.name: Peanut Butter E-Commerce Website
content: Developed a secure, scalable e-commerce platform with an admin dashboard for product management, implementing CMS-like workflows for streamlined operations.
Developed PHP-based backend with MySQL for product and user management, ensuring secure data handling via {{XAMPP/Apache}}.
Designed responsive, cross-device frontend using {{HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.}}
Implemented admin dashboard for inventory, order, and role management.
Followed clean code standards and collaborated via {{Git/GitHub}}.
